item.description: We will continue with Part 2: Of Common-Wealth from Hobbes' Leviathan (Penguin Classics ISBN: 0-140-43195-0). This is even more text for the next two weeks than we had for the previous 3 weeks (we had 3 weeks between the last meeting and the one before). Our plan is to cover Part 2 and Part 3 in the next 3 meetings so reading 2/3 of part 2 for the next time is what is really needed. Let's have an interesting reading and a good meeting like the last one.
item.name: Thomas Hobbes: Leviathan II
